title: Your Wallet: Financial Gaps
contentencoded:
We're exploring gaps, in our economy and in our lives. We want to know, have you had a gap month, a year, or more?

Maybe you needed money before school, or you were unemployed for a while.

Lizzie O'Leary took your stories of  financial gaps in time to  Lisa Kueng and Ellen Rogin authors of Picture Your Prosperity, for advice.

Send us an email, or reach us on Twitter, @MarketplaceWKND

teaser: Tell us about that financial gap in time and how it affected your life.
